title: Is We Dumb? | Bubbles. Bomb Shelter. Umbilical Cord. Tiny Pillow.
description:
Think about living in a world where you had to throw confetti EVERY TIME you said the F-word. That's neat! Let's talk about that, getting insanely mad about a seal pillow, a war that was almost started over fish farts, a $6,000 charging cable, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/jSffBIqK8T4
